attributes.action: reject the eu 'consitution' treaty on the basis that he has no right to give up our freedoms
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the eu treaty (constitution) thansfers powers and therefore rights from the british public to the eu superstate. A state that no-one voted for. The rights that the pm wishes to remove from the british public belong to the british people and do not belong to the government. Therefore they have no right to hand over the freedoms of british citizens without a referendum.
